name: Gone Home to Mushroom Kingdom
description:
Ludum Dare 41 Game Jam

Theme: Combine 2 Incompatible Genres

Left Click to interact

Right Click to dismiss notes

'E' to jump-interact

Our game is a combination of the walking sim with the classic platformer. We've combined two iconic games from both to create an experience that transcends its origin genres. Gone Home to Mushroom King is an experience unlike any other, taking the best of both worlds and creating something EVEN BETTER.
